message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the opportunity to purchase this incredible product with you. I believe it's a game-changer, and I'm confident you'll love it. As a starting point, I'm willing to offer it to you for $1000000. This is a great deal, and I'm confident you won't find a better price anywhere else.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $800000. I believe this is a fair price considering the market value of similar products.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective on the market value, but I'm afraid I can't accept your offer of $800000. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer you the product for $900000. I think this is a fair compromise, considering the value this product can bring to your business.

Thank you for the revised offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to compromise. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway from your original offer, so I'll counter with $950000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value I'll get from the product.

Thank you for your revised offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, and I'm willing to make another concession. However, I'm not willing to go below $975000. I believe this product is worth every penny, and I'm willing to meet you halfway from your offer. I'm offering you the product for $975000. This is my final counteroffer.

Thank you for your final counteroffer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm still a bit above my budget.
